name: Hugo Man Eau de Toilette
description:
Hugo Man Eau de Toilette - The Bold Aromatic Signature Scent

Discover the iconic Hugo Man Eau de Toilette, a revolutionary aromatic fougÃ¨re fragrance that has defined modern masculinity since its launch in 1995. This fresh masculine scent embodies the spirit of rebellion and individuality that has made it a bestselling fragrance for decades. âœ¨

Product Information

Size 75ml / 125ml / 200ml
Gender Men
Product Type Eau de Toilette
Concentration Medium (8-12%)
Brand Hugo Boss

The Scent Profile of Hugo Man EDT

Top Notes Green Apple, Pine Needles, Grapefruit, Basil, Mint
Heart Notes Lavender, Jasmine, Sage, Geranium, Carnation
Base Notes Cedar, Fir Balsam, Sandalwood, Vetiver, Suede

Key Features of Hugo Man Fragrance:

  • ðŸŒ¿ Crisp green apple opening that creates an unforgettable first impression
  • ðŸŒ² Refreshing pine and aromatic herbs for a distinctly masculine character
  • ðŸ’Ž Iconic blue flask bottle with a military-inspired cap design
  • ðŸ”¥ Medium longevity with moderate sillage, perfect for daily wear
  • ðŸ’« Versatile fragrance suitable for office, casual outings, and active lifestyles

The Legacy of Hugo Boss Men's Fragrance

Created in 1995 by master perfumers Bob Aliano and Calice Becker, Hugo Man EDT was designed to challenge convention. The fragrance was revolutionary at its time, featuring a unique blend of natural and synthetic notes that appealed to a new generation of men. The distinctive blue bottle with its military flask design has become an iconic symbol in the modern fragrance landscape.

Hugo Boss launched this fragrance with the slogan "Don't imitate, innovate," encouraging men to express their individuality and break free from tradition. This philosophy continues to resonate with the Hugo Man wearer today â€“ someone who is confident, adventurous, and unafraid to forge his own path. ðŸŒŸ

When and How to Wear Hugo Man Eau de Toilette

This designer fragrance shines in casual and professional settings alike. It's particularly effective in spring and summer months when its fresh, aromatic qualities can truly breathe. Apply to pulse points for maximum effect, and consider reapplying after 4-6 hours for all-day confidence.

Frequently Asked Question

Q: How long does Hugo Man Eau de Toilette last on skin?

A: Hugo Man EDT typically lasts 4-6 hours on most skin types. The fresh top notes of green apple and citrus create an immediate impact in the first hour, while the aromatic heart and woody base notes continue to project for several hours afterward. For extended longevity, apply to well-moisturized skin and consider layering with other Hugo products like shower gel or deodorant.

#

Experience the bold freshness of Hugo Man EDT, a timeless aromatic fragrance featuring crisp green apple, invigorating pine, and masculine woods. This iconic scent delivers confidence and energy for the modern man who lives by his own rules. ðŸŒ¿âœ¨
